name: Zach's Battle Arena
description:
What happens when a regular guy gets blamed for a robbery?

A. A Fight on a skyscraper

B. People getting beat up left and right

C. All of the above

Hint: It's C

You punch and kick the people angy at you and teach them an overall lesson. So yeah, beat em up.

Controls

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Arrow Keys: Move Around

Z, Space: Jump

X: Attack

C: Sprint
